Have any of you ever seen her babies ”
Jumper lives in the Green Forest
They are the dearest little things
That is to help them to remain unseen by their enemies
where the sun breaks through the trees
they spots the ground with light
they seem so much like their surroundings
they are not often seen even the sharpest eyes

heads stretched flat on the ground
heads do not move so much as a hair
the first thing is to keep perfectly still

As a rule Mrs. Lightfoot has two babies each spring

them hidden in the deepest thickets

how under the sun any one with little hoofed feet like Lightfoot 's can swim
Lightfoot is a good fond of the water
fond of the water ” replied Old Mother Nature
When he is hard pressed Wolves Dogs
he makes for the nearest water
He does not hesitate to swim across a river or even a small lake
where there are close thickets with here and there open places
He likes the edge of the Green Forest
where he can come out in the open fields
He be within a short distance of the protecting trees and bushes
He is usually found not from a brook , pond or river
He has a favorite drinking place
He goes to drink early in the morning just at dusk
During the day he usually sleeps
hidden away in a thicket under a windfall
coming out late in the afternoon
He feeds mostly in the early evening
He eats grass other plants beechnuts acorns leaves twigs of certain trees
He delights to get into Farmer Brown 's garden , where almost every green thing tempts him
